titles.title: TASK Act
TASK Act
Training Assignments for Student Knowledge Act
To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that tasks and services performed by certain individuals in postsecondary vocational institutions not be treated as employment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Training Assignments for Student Knowledge Act or the TASK Act
This bill excludes from the definition of an employee under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 an individual who performs tasks and services required by a postsecondary vocational institution to obtain a recognized postsecondary credential.
